transportAdvice: Dubai has a modern metro system and bus network that connects major tourist areas, shopping malls, and the airport, making public transit a practical option for many visitors. Taxis are widely available and metered, though walking is only comfortable in cooler months as summer heat makes outdoor movement difficult.

weather.description: Pleasant and mild with warm sunny days and cool evenings, making it one of the best months to visit.
Comfortable warm weather continues with low humidity and mostly clear skies.
Temperatures begin to rise noticeably but conditions remain pleasant for outdoor activities.
Getting warmer with occasional dusty winds; outdoor sightseeing is still manageable in the mornings.
Heat intensifies significantly and outdoor activity is best limited to early morning or evening hours.
Very hot and increasingly humid; most activity shifts indoors to air-conditioned venues.
Peak summer heat with high humidity makes outdoor exposure uncomfortable and potentially hazardous.
Conditions remain extremely hot and humid, similar to July; indoor attractions are the main draw.
Still very hot with high humidity, though temperatures begin a gradual decline toward month's end.
Noticeably more comfortable as heat eases; outdoor activities become increasingly enjoyable again.
Warm and pleasant with lower humidity, marking the return of ideal sightseeing conditions.
Cool and sunny with comfortable temperatures, making it one of the most popular months for visitors.
